title: How can I change my visible name?
body:
Forever ago, back in I think 2012 or 2013 or something like that, I had made an account and forgot about it. Now I want to get back into the game and I see that my name is a string of alphanumerics, which I don't believe was the same name when I had first created my account. My login name is still the same and that's all well and good, but I don't want to be known in-game as "IS19fe6b8c39b55ab721ed2". Is it possible to change this? Thanks in advance.

EDIT: Just found out I get to choose a new name in the launcher. Thanks anyways.

replies.body: Glad all is well now!  Your name might change like this after inactivity or if it gets taken.  Usually it comes with a free name change, which seems to be the case here!
